name: Desert Tow Truck
description:
Made for the Desert Bus 2021 Game Jam. Help out the crew and drive the tow truck to bring the bus home! 

  • An exciting, thrill-a-minute real-time simulation
  • Physics guaranteed to transpire
  • Maybe get the bus's alignment and steering checked when you get back

Trust Engineering! There was a bug in the HTML version causing framerate issues, but it should be fixed now. If you do get framerate problems, take the stream down and bring it back up, and tell chat not to panic.
